title: tAmadam sheidiDAmal
sahitya:
tAmadam sheidiDAmal nI manam uvandennai tAngi aNaiya vENum gAngEyanE innum


anupallavi

  tImaikku uLLAkkum kAma krOdham pOkki pAmaran en pizhaippu kSEmamuDan tazhaikka


caraNam    varumaip-piNiyinAl varundi vADiDAmal porumaiyuDan poruLai pOdumaLavu tEDi nAn
puriyum eppaNiyilum siridum shramamurAdu perum pAlumE veTri peTriDum aruL puriya
